00120 inline double sqr( double x ) 
00121 { 
00122     return x*x; 
00123 }

00185 Array< double > mean( const Array< double >& x )
00186 {
00187     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) > 1 )
00188 
00189     Array< double > m( x[ 0 ] );
00190     for( unsigned i = 1; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00191         m += x[ i ];
00192     m /= double( x.dim( 0 ) );
00193     return m;
00194 }

00234 Array< double > variance( const Array< double >& x )
00235 {
00236     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) > 1 && x.dim( 0 ) > 0 )
00237 
00238     unsigned i, j;
00239     unsigned size = x.nelem( ) / x.dim( 0 );
00240     Array< double > m( size ); // vector of mean values.
00241     Array< double > v( size ); // 
00242 
00243     m = 0.;
00244     v = 0.;
00245 
00246     for( i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00247         for( j = 0; j < size; ++j ) {
00248             m( j ) += x.elem( i * size + j );
00249             v( j ) += sqr( x.elem( i * size + j ) );
00250         }
00251 
00252     for( j = 0; j < size; ++j ) {
00253         m( j ) /= x.dim( 0 );
00254         v( j )  = std::max( 0., v( j ) / x.dim( 0 ) - m( j ) * m( j ) );
00255     }
00256 
00257     // re-arrange variance array
00258     if( x.ndim( ) > 1 )
00259         v.resize( x[ 0 ], true );
00260 
00261     return v;
00262 }

00300 double angle( const Array< double >& x, const Array< double >& y )
00301 {
00302   //return scalar_product( x, y ) / sqrt( sumOfSqr( x ) * sumOfSqr( y ) );
00303 
00304     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 && x.samedim( y ) )
00305 
00306     double sumxx = 0;
00307     double sumyy = 0;
00308     double sumxy = 0;
00309 
00310     for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.nelem( ); ++i ) {
00311         sumxx += x( i ) * x( i );
00312         sumyy += y( i ) * y( i );
00313         sumxy += x( i ) * y( i );
00314     }
00315 
00316     return ( sumxx == 0 || sumyy == 0 ) ? 0. : sumxy / sqrt( sumxx * sumyy );
00317 }

00355 void meanvar
00356 (
00357     const Array< double >& x,
00358     Array< double >&       m,
00359     Array< double >&       v
00360 )
00361 {
00362     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) > 1 )
00363 
00364     unsigned i, j;
00365 
00366     // number of elements for each "row":
00367     unsigned size = x.nelem( ) / x.dim( 0 );
00368 
00369     m.resize( size );
00370     v.resize( size );
00371     m = 0.;
00372     v = 0.;
00373 
00374     for ( i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00375     {
00376         for ( j = 0; j < size; ++j ) 
00377         {
00378             // Sum of elements of each "row":
00379             m( j ) += x.elem( i * size + j );
00380             v( j ) += sqr( x.elem( i * size + j ) );
00381         }
00382     }
00383 
00384     for( j = 0; j < size; ++j ) {
00385         // Calculate mean value by dividing
00386         // by no. of "rows":
00387         m( j ) /= x.dim( 0 );
00388         v( j )  = v( j ) / x.dim( 0 ) - m( j ) * m( j );
00389     }
00390 
00391     // re-arrange arrays
00392     m.resize( x[ 0 ], true );
00393     v.resize( x[ 0 ], true );
00394 }
00395 
00396 /* 
00397         /brief Calculates the mean and variance values of 1d-arrays p(x)
00398 
00399         calculates the first two moments of a discrete value array and
00400         his corresponding x-values
00401         /param pxA              1d array with functionvalues
00402         /param xA               1d array with corresponding x values
00403         /param mA               retunsvalue meanval
00404         /param vA               returnvalue variance
00405         /param startA   start of a calculation window
00406         /param endA             end of a calculation window
00407 */
00408 void meanvar
00409 (
00410     const Array< double >& pxA,
00411     const Array< double >& xA,
00412         double &mA,
00413         double &vA,
00414         const int startA,
00415         const int endA
00416 )
00417 {
00418 //      SIZE_CHECK( xA.ndim( ) != 1 )
00419 //      SIZE_CHECK( pxA.ndim( ) != xA.ndim( ) )
00420 //      SIZE_CHECK( pxA.nelem( ) != xA.nelem( ) )
00421 
00422         int size = pxA.nelem( );
00423         int startL      = ( startA <0 )?0:startA;
00424         int endL        = ( endA == -1 )?size:endA;
00425         if (startL == endL)
00426         {
00427                 mA = startA;
00428                 vA = 0;
00429         }
00430         double ew = 0;
00431         double sum = 0;
00432         int i;
00433         // calculate first moment
00434         for( i= startL; i < endL ;++i)
00435         {
00436                 ew      += pxA.elem( i ) * xA.elem( i );
00437                 sum     += pxA.elem( i );
00438         }
00439         mA = (ew==0)?0:ew / sum;
00440         // calculate variance
00441         // variance is the second central moment
00442         const int ii = 2; 
00443         double vc = 0; 
00444         for( i= startL; i < endL ;++i)
00445         {
00446                 vc += pow( (xA.elem( i ) - mA), (double)ii ) * pxA.elem( i );
00447         }
00448         vA = sqrt((vc == 0)?0:vc / sum);
00449         
00450 }

00455 //===========================================================================
00499 double corrcoef( const Array< double >& x, const Array< double >& y )
00500 {
00501     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 && x.samedim( y ) )
00502 
00503     double sumxx = 0;
00504     double sumyy = 0;
00505     double sumxy = 0;
00506     double sumx  = 0;
00507     double sumy  = 0;
00508 
00509     if( x.nelem( ) > 0 ) {
00510         for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.nelem( ); ++i ) {
00511             sumxx += x( i ) * x( i );
00512             sumyy += y( i ) * y( i );
00513             sumxy += x( i ) * y( i );
00514             sumx  += x( i );
00515             sumy  += y( i );
00516         }
00517 
00518         sumxx /= x.nelem( );
00519         sumyy /= x.nelem( );
00520         sumxy /= x.nelem( );
00521         sumx  /= x.nelem( );
00522         sumy  /= x.nelem( );
00523 
00524         sumxx -= sumx * sumx;
00525         sumyy -= sumy * sumy;
00526         sumxy -= sumx * sumy;
00527     }
00528 
00529     return ( sumxx == 0 || sumyy == 0 ) ? 0. : sumxy / sqrt( sumxx * sumyy );
00530 }

00534 //===========================================================================
00575 Array< double > corrcoef( const Array< double >& x )
00576 {
00577     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) > 1 )
00578 
00579     unsigned i, j;
00580     Array< double > C( covariance( x ) );
00581 
00582     for( i = 0; i < C.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00583         for( j = 0; j < i; ++j )
00584             if( C( i, i ) == 0 || C( j, j ) == 0 )
00585                 C( i, j ) = C( j, i ) = 0;
00586             else
00587                 C( i, j ) = C( j ,i ) = C( i, j ) / sqrt( C( i, i ) * C( j, j ) );
00588 
00589     for( i = 0; i < C.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00590         C( i, i ) = 1;
00591 
00592     return Array< double >( C, true );
00593 }

00596 //===========================================================================
00635 double covariance( const Array< double >& x, const Array< double >& y )
00636 {
00637     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 && x.samedim( y ) )
00638 
00639     double sumxy = 0;
00640     double sumx  = 0;
00641     double sumy  = 0;
00642 
00643     if( x.nelem( ) > 0 ) {
00644         for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.nelem( ); ++i ) {
00645             sumxy += x( i ) * y( i );
00646             sumx  += x( i );
00647             sumy  += y( i );
00648         }
00649 
00650         sumxy /= x.nelem( );
00651         sumx  /= x.nelem( );
00652         sumy  /= x.nelem( );
00653     }
00654 
00655     return sumxy - sumx * sumy;
00656 }
00657 
00658 //===========================================================================
00696 Array< double > covariance( const Array< double >& x )
00697 {
00698     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00699 
00700     unsigned num = x.dim( 0 );
00701     unsigned dim = x.dim( 1 );
00702 
00703     Array< double > mean ( dim );
00704     Array< double > covar( dim, dim );
00705 
00706     mean  = 0.;
00707     covar = 0.;
00708 
00709     for( unsigned i = num; i--; )
00710     {
00711         mean  += x[ i ];
00712         covar += outerProduct( x[ i ], x[ i ] );
00713     }
00714 
00715     mean  /= double( num );
00716     covar /= double( num );
00717     covar -= outerProduct( mean, mean );
00718 
00719     return Array< double >( covar, true );
00720 }
